description: Log Search and Filtering - Search, filter, and highlight logs with regex support

userStories.title: Add log search input and highlight matches
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to search logs with regex and see matches highlighted so I can find specific events quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Press '/' in log view to open search input (like vim)
Search input appears at bottom of log view
Type regex pattern and press Enter to search
Matching lines are highlighted in yellow
Press 'n' to jump to next match, 'N' for previous
Press 'Esc' to clear search
Search is case-insensitive by default
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add log level filtering
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to filter logs by level (INFO, WARN, ERROR) to focus on important messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Press '1' to show only ERROR logs
Press '2' to show only WARN logs
Press '3' to show only INFO logs
Press '0' to show all logs (default)
Filter state shown in log view title: 'Logs: [ERROR] container_name'
Auto-detect log levels from message content (contains 'ERROR:', 'WARN:', etc.)
Filter applies to existing logs in memory
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add timestamp filtering
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to filter logs by time range to investigate issues from specific periods.
acceptanceCriteria: Press 't' in log view to open time filter input
Input accepts '5m' (last 5 minutes), '1h' (last hour), or ISO timestamp
Only show logs newer than the specified time
Show 'Time filter: 5m' in log view title
Press 'T' to clear time filter
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Export logs to file
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to save filtered logs to a file for analysis or sharing.
acceptanceCriteria: Press 'S' (shift+s) in log view to save logs
Prompt for filename (default: 'container_name_YYYY-MM-DD_HH-MM-SS.log')
Save currently visible (filtered) logs to file
Show confirmation: 'Saved 150 lines to container_name_... .log'
File saved in current directory
Typecheck passes
